name: Speller - Spell checker for design
description:
This plugin is what you really need if you want to make sure that your great design will not be spoiled by typos. Focus on your design, and we will help you with spell checking.


Features:

  • Fast scanning of the whole page or specific artboards or modules
  • Use one of the best existing dictionaries by Microsoft
  • Fix mistake with one click based on relevant dictionary suggestions
  • Focus to find the place of your typo on the canvas
  • Exclude words that are not mistakes for you, and they will not be checked as mistakes in a future
  • Auto-fix all same mistakes, by fixing one of them
  • 16 certificated language dictionaries
  • Low memory use, so fewer chances to see “red line alert” :)


This plugin was made because we all make typos sometimes, but it doesn’t have to affect our design quality.
